Package org.opendtacho.DDDQuery.internalData.Security

Class Summary
SecurityByteArrayTools The SecurityByteArrayTools class provides methods to convert byte arrays to hex strings and vice versa.
SecurityCAPublicKey Public Key of a certification authority.
SecurityCertificateCheck Deciphers the signature of a certificate and checks if the certificate is valid.
SecurityCertificateContent The content of a certificate.
SecurityDataSignatureCheck Checks the integrity of data and its signature.
